PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-06782010-05-27,  AAFC,  ,  ,  , 
ActFarm Income Protection Act
SubjectAgri-Recovery - British Columbia Avian Influenza Assistance Program
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food to provide assistance through the Agricultural Disaster Relief Program under the AgriRecovery Framework to British Columbia poultry producers whose flocks were destroyed following an outbreak of avian influenza through a contribution under the federal component of the 2010 British Columbia Avian Influenza Assistance Program.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Agri-Recovery - British Columbia Avian Influenza Assistance Program
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food to provide assistance through the Agricultural Disaster Relief Program under the AgriRecovery Framework to British Columbia poultry producers whose flocks were destroyed following an outbreak of avian influenza through a contribution under the federal component of the 2010 British Columbia Avian Influenza Assistance Program.
